author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Available Now: https://www.dvgiochi.com/catalogo/rumblebots-ita/

Rumblebots is a fast-paced deck management game where you build a squad of fighting machines and throw them into the arena. Across six rounds you’ll recruit, recycle, and level up Bots during the Build Phase and then let them clash it out in the Battle Phase. The last team standing claims victory, while the winner upgrades their workshop with powerful crystals to keep the chaos going. It’s all about synergy, strategy, and a little robo-smackdown energy.

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Rumblebots Preview - Auto Battler Tabletop Mayhem 🤖 (Board Games Direct)

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Coming October 2025: https://mighty-boards.com/1/66/products/Pinched-?utm_source=SUSD&utm_medium=SUSD&utm_campaign=SUSD&utm_id=Pinched&utm_term=SUSD

In this clever little burglary game, everyone’s out to “redistribute wealth” (a.k.a. steal shiny things). Each round, one player becomes the Mastermind, plotting the perfect heist—unless the other burglars guess the target and crash the job. Outsmart your rivals, snatch valuables, and sell off the loot to prove you’re the best thief in town.

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: Pinched! Preview: Getting Heisty On It! 🕵️‍♂️ (Board Games Direct)

author: Shut Up & Sit Down
description:
Coming October 2025: https://www.goodgamespublishing.com/games/12-rivers.html

In 12 Rivers, you’ll guide your tribe’s warriors up the mountain, camping along a winding river to collect nature’s bounty, MAGICAL PEARLS. The higher you climb, the rarer the rewards—but it’ll cost you more to stay there. Over five rounds, you’ll haul pearls back to your villagers on your alpacas , balance risk and reward, and compete to see whose tribe prospers most from the river’s gifts.

#boardgames #games #gamenight #gaming #tabletop #tabletopgames #shorts
title: 12 Rivers Preview - Pearls and Alpacas! 💧🌿 (Board Games Direct)
